```py
>>> import numpy.ma as ma
>>> a = ma.masked_equal([[1,2],[3,4]], 2)
>>> a
masked_array(
 data=[[1, --],
 [3, 4]],
 mask=[[False,  True],
 [False, False]],
 fill_value=2)
>>> ma.getmask(a)
array([[False,  True],
 [False, False]]) 
```

```py
>>> b = ma.masked_array([[1,2],[3,4]])
>>> b
masked_array(
 data=[[1, 2],
 [3, 4]],
 mask=False,
 fill_value=999999)
>>> ma.nomask
False
>>> ma.getmask(b) == ma.nomask
True
>>> b.mask == ma.nomask
True 
```
